author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Rig rollover in Lehigh Valley among highway headaches this holiday travel day
text:
Summary by Ground News Multi-vehicle crash on I-78 East near mile 60.6 in Upper Saucon Township. A male occupant was reported out of the vehicle but requesting to be checked out by EMS in the rollover. Earlier incidents also described as multi-vehicles crashes in the Lehigh County area were slowing traffic. Share menu More

lehighvalleylive Lean Left High Factuality Rig rollover in Lehigh Valley among highway headaches this holiday travel day A tractor-trailer that rolled onto its side on Interstate 78 in Lehigh County was one of several crashes slowing area highways Thursday afternoon.
